scripts.test-e2e: npm run clean && npx playwright test
scripts.test-e2e-dev: npx cross-env ENV=dev npm run test-e2e
scripts.test-e2e-stg: npx cross-env ENV=stg npm run test-e2e
scripts.test-e2e-prd: npx cross-env ENV=prd npm run test-e2e
scripts.test-ui: npm run clean && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test-debug: npm run clean && npx playwright test --debug
